author: Woo Bih Li J:
casename: RBG Resources plc (in liquidation) v Banque Cantonale Vaudoise and Others
counsel: Matthew Saw (Lee and Lee) and Seah Yi-Lein (Shook Lin and Bok) for plaintiff; Lawrence Teh (Rodyk and Davidson) for second defendant
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Appeals/Leave/Successful plaintiff denied full costs of action as it failed on issue raised during trial/Whether plaintiff should be granted leave to appeal against judgment on costs/Section 34(2)(b) Supreme Court of Judicature Act (Cap 322, 1999 Rev Ed)
